.class public auto ansi sealed OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: que contiene los datos del evento.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. ## Examples El siguiente ejemplo de código muestra cómo abrir una secuencia para escribir los datos que se cargarán.The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] El siguiente método se llama cuando la secuencia está disponible.The following method is called when the stream is available.
